event.title: covers an area of 895 km² (346 mi²), and the population as of 2000

data.event: It covers an area of 895 km² (346 mi²), and the population as of 2000 is 16,504, of which 5,500 live in the central town of Mengen.

event.title: perform at the food festival in August

data.event: The köçek also perform at the food festival in August.
